competitors.name: UKG (Ultimate Kronos Group)
competitors.notes: Formed through 2020 merger of Ultimate Software and Kronos; formidable competitor

competitors.name: Oracle HCM Cloud
competitors.notes: Leader in cloud HCM for nine consecutive years; enterprise-grade capabilities

competitors.name: SAP SuccessFactors
competitors.notes: Modular cloud-native HCM suite for global companies

competitors.name: Infor CloudSuite HCM
competitors.notes: Acquired by Koch Industries in February 2020 ($13 billion transaction)

competitors.name: Cornerstone OnDemand
competitors.notes: Acquired Saba Software in 2020, expanding learning capabilities

competitors.name: ADP
competitors.notes: Global provider with ADP Vantage HCM for large enterprises

competitors.name: BambooHR
competitors.notes: Alternative for smaller companies seeking simpler HCM

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Broader technology competitor in enterprise software space

context: 2020 was a transformative year in the HCM market. The merger of Ultimate Software and Kronos created UKG, a major new competitor. The competitive landscape featured established enterprise players and the newly-formed UKG powerhouse.
